    • Method Detail

      • createAndLogError

        public static RuntimeException createAndLogError(Logger log,
                                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                                 String extraInfo,
                                 Throwable exception)
        Wraps the given exception into a runtime error and logs an error.
        Parameters:
        log - logger for to log error
        req - HTTP request (may be null)
        extraInfo - additional information about the context of the crash (may be null), preferably formatted as 'key1=value1[\n char]key2=value2'
        exception - exception to log
        Returns:
        runtime exception wrapping the original exception

      • createAndLogError

        public static RuntimeException createAndLogError(Logger log,
                                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                                 String extraInfo,
                                 RuntimeException exception)
        Logs an error.
        Parameters:
        log - logger for to log error
        req - HTTP request (may be null)
        extraInfo - additional information about the context of the crash (may be null), preferably formatted as 'key1=value1[\n char]key2=value2'
        exception - exception to log
        Returns:
        runtime exception wrapping the original exception
